attributes.action: urge the Premier League and Football League to use Fairtrade Footballs on match day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Countless people across the world face poverty, and Fairtrade products are one way which is lifting people out of that poverty. By using fairtrade footballs, the Premier League and Football League can both help lift people out of poverty and send a strong signal around the world that we - and they - care.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the FA and/or Premier League
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
